Director has well researched to make this a different movie compared to usual super hero movie. this superhero movie doesn't use lots of vfx, action sequences and science like Marvel cinematic universe but only relies on a well written screenplay. what amazed me is the way he elevated mass and sentimental scenes by not letting audience guess what gonna happen next. I happened to see some first time response of people coming out of theatre critisising screenplay and with disappointed face !! what do you expect a cliche superhero with lots of crappy vfx like krish3 or 2.0 that relies on technology rather than a solid script ??? there might be some sequences that questions logic but since I'm not so brilliant to critisise those i never minded those but was fully immersed into the beauty created by ps mithran. cinematography , bgm , action , direction was too good 💥🙏🏻  
Performance wise it's Action king Arjun who shined in mist if the parts. Siva had minimal role as a superhero and arjun's performance will make you understand why he is called action king !! it was a throwback to his old times where he was at his best. siva did what he was asked to do and lead heroine has nothing much to do. A must watch for all indian parents !! 
only negative was that you may find some cliche narration is some part as well in the script but considering it as a superhero movie that's negligible. yuvans bgm and George c willaims cinematography  elavated  every mass scenes to it best. some frames were jst lit 😍💯 concept is simple but screenplay and making made the difference. 
Rating : 8/10

Director P.S.MITRAN had good experience in taking a social responsible subject like cybercrime,education system,etc.After the success of"IRUMBU THIRAI"which shows about corrupted cyber platform,he again back with"HERO" which staring SIVAKARTHIKEYAN and ARJUN in lead role.In the movie he strongly opposes our spoon feeding ,corrupted education system and selfish attitude of parents.This movie delivers a very good message in proper form.It is not a superhero movie,morethan there are some elements.Strong Script and Good direction of this movie is to be appreciated.If you watch this movie with your parents,sometimes it maybe helpful to you in selecting your future.Here the INNOVATIVE Ideas Of BACKBENCHERS are praised.This movie is totally a STRONG STORM against  our CORRUPTED,UNLOGICAL,SPOON FEEDING EDUCATION SYSTEM.Here the director gives equal importance to each and every characters.Finally we can see that everyone in this movie was a HERO.The screen presence of ACTION KING is superb.Suitable BGM but other type of music like intro song etc didn't get up to the expectations.SK must be Proud to be in the part of this movie.One of the best of 2019.
